fever: Take adequate rest and avoid physical exertion.
Drink plenty of fluids such as water, oral rehydration solution, or clear soups.
Use a fever-reducing medicine like paracetamol/acetaminophen if needed (avoid overdose).
Monitor body temperature twice a day.
Avoid cold exposure and keep the body warm.
cough: Drink warm fluids such as herbal tea or warm water.
Use honey (for adults and children over 1 year) to soothe throat irritation.
Use steam inhalation or humidified air to ease coughing.
Rest your voice and avoid talking excessively.
general: Stay at home and avoid close contact with others.
Wash hands frequently with soap and water.
Cover mouth and nose while coughing or sneezing.
Get adequate sleep to support immune recovery.
